title: Situational Awareness Masterclass
description: A comprehensive course on building, maintaining, and recovering situational awareness in dynamic operational environments. Covers perception, comprehension, projection, team SA, and threat management. Designed for operators and supervisors in high-reliability industries.
learningObjectives: Understand the three levels of situational awareness and how they interact
Develop effective scanning and perception techniques
Build accurate mental models and update them based on new information
Project future states and anticipate system behavior
Recognize and mitigate common SA threats
Maintain shared SA across teams and during handovers
